products.title: Roller, 4155 Sand - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Semi-transparentinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Bayham, Parchment - Vista Blind
products.description: Elegance and sophistication go hand in hand when you caste your eye over the bayham range. Parchment compliments the free flowing nature of the voile panels with gently placed strips of soft white fabric that is as finely woven as it is calm and refreshing. Parchment allows you to make a feature of your window spaces again as you celebrate the beauty of the simple things in life. Keeping your decor crisp and calm with large white scatter cushions and a light grey rug will give your living room the relaxing look and feel that you have always wanted.

products.title: Genesis Stone Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This beige roller blind is a classic neutral and will look great alongside any existing decor or colour schemes. The electric aspect of this blind makes it easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows. products.title: Splash Beige Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. This elegant cream coloured elecrtric roller blind will make a wonderful additon to any room and will compliment wooden tones throughtout the home. Electric roller blinds work perfectly for more difficult to reach windows & can provide the perfect finishing touch when dressing a window. With a 5 year guarantee on all their products, you can rest assured that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Mushroom Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Decorate your windows with this elegant roller blind showcasing an ornate damask style pattern. The soft shaded effect in a warm grey-brown hue is very on-trend and versatile for blending with existing colour schemes. The versailles mushroom blackout electric roller blind will offer convenient and effective shading in your home thanks to the blackout quality of the fabric that can be lowered at the touch of a button.
